item.title: VGDownloader: Download Video Game Music
item.description: VGDownloader is a lightweight CLI that lets you download (almost) any video game soundtrack. Written in Go and built on PromptUI, it pings downloads.khinsider.com to retrieve the album for download. It uses channels and work groups to concurrently get the download links for every song in the album, downloading them all at the same time. This significantly reduces the amount of time to download the album vs. sequentially downloading from the website.
